travelingsalespersonproblemshow

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelingsalespersonproblemshow.Graph

  • public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
    Indirected graph with each vertex labeled from number 0 to V. The graph is implemented as a one dimensional array of crime records along with a two-dimensional array of doubles-holding the communicated distance between each pair.
    Since:
    11/04/2015

        Returns:

      • contains

        public boolean contains(int v,
               int w)
        Pre: v and w are existing vertex labels in graph. Post: find out if the graph has edge between 2 vertex.
        Parameters:
        v-one - vertex label
        w-the - other vertex label
        Returns:
        true if the graph has edge between vertex whose labels are v and w, and false if not.
